snippet: The Rangers roared back in the second game of a double-header against the Angels to assure themselves, and two other teams, a spot in the playoffs.
abstract: Texas Rangers split doubleheader with Los Angeles Angels, losing the first game, 5-4, and winning the second, 8-7, to secure a playoff spot; Rangers are one victory from claiming their third consecutive American League West title.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers roared back in the second game of a double-header against the Angels to assure themselves, and two other teams, a spot in the playoffs.

headline.seo: Late Rally Carries Angels Past Rangers in First Game of Doubleheader
headline.main: Rangers Lock In Playoff Spot and Help Others, Too
headline.print_headline: Rangers Get Playoff Spot and Lift Others
